com.raphaellevy.cs1.rockpaperscissors

Class ConsoleMenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raphaellevy.cs1.rockpaperscissors.ConsoleMenuItem

  • class ConsoleMenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an item in a ConsoleMenu.
    Author:
    raffa

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Action action
      The Action to be executed (#run()) when this item is selected.
      (package private) java.lang.String shortcut
      Can be typed by the user instead of the full text of the item.
      (package private) java.lang.String text
      The name of the item displayed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsoleMenuItem(java.lang.String shortcut, java.lang.String text, Action action)
      Create a new ConsoleMenuItem with the specified parameters.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • action

        final Action action
        The Action to be executed (#run()) when this item is selected.

      • shortcut

        final java.lang.String shortcut
        Can be typed by the user instead of the full text of the item.

      • text

        final java.lang.String text
        The name of the item displayed. The user can enter either this or the shortcut to select the item.
